metadata.name: Publish - Description (Recruiter)
metadata.value:
We're looking for a passionate and skilled Ad Analytics Data Scientist to join our international mobile game development team. You will become a key part of our Ad Analytics department, helping us understand and optimize the monetization performance of our games through data. From raw event tracking to dashboards and actionable insights, your work will directly impact the commercial success of our games and shape the player experience across millions of users.
You’ll collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, SW and data engineers, and game teams, taking ownership of complex analytical tasks, building scalable data solutions and assessing the impact of different ad monetisation strategies You’ll also bring fresh perspectives and develop new strategies to improve ad monetization through advanced analytics and machine learning.
We value curiosity, clear communication, and drive. If you're excited by the opportunity to grow fast, contribute to impactful decisions, and work in a supportive and results-oriented environment — we’d love to hear from you.

metadata.name: Publish - Responsibilities (Recruiter)
metadata.value:
- You will perform end-to-end analytics, including defining data tracking needs, building, testing, and maintaining data pipelines to ensure data quality and provide efficient reporting.
- You'll conduct monetization performance analysis, exploring and evaluating ad monetization improvements by proposing, designing, running, and analyzing A/B tests.
- You will generate insights by conducting exploratory and ad-hoc analyses on large datasets from multiple sources to uncover monetization opportunities and inform ad product decisions.
- You'll develop reusable analysis scripts and pipelines to automate data analysis and support faster, data-driven decision-making.
- You will develop and maintain data products like dashboards and automated reports to track key performance indicators (KPIs) for various teams and leadership.
- A key part of your role is communication; you will clearly summarize and present actionable insights and propose next steps to a wide range of stakeholders, from development teams to company leadership.
- You'll have the opportunity to innovate by finding new ways to improve ad-based monetization and optimize revenues using machine learning or other optimization techniques.
- You will engage in cross-functional collaboration, partnering with teams across the company to provide an analytical perspective and help prioritize work based on business impact.

- Clearly communicate analyses to both technical and non-technical audiences.

- Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
- Apply statistical and machine learning techniques to solve real-world business problems.

- Proven track record of taking projects from idea to delivery.

- Stay informed on industry trends, emerging platforms, and market shifts in order to proactively identify opportunities and mitigate potential risks.
- Share knowledge, insights, and best practices across teams to support personal and collective growth in UA capabilities.
